text:
Exceptional Experience with Mitcher!!!

I recently purchased a used car from pang’s motor  and I couldn’t be happier with the service! A huge thanks to Mitcher! who made the entire process smooth, transparent, and stress-free. He was extremely knowledgeable, patient, and never pressured me into a decision. Mitcher took the time to understand my needs and found the perfect vehicle for my budget.

The dealership itself was professional, with a great selection of well-maintained cars. The paperwork was handled efficiently, and I felt confident in my purchase. If you're looking for a trustworthy salesman, I highly recommend Mitcher —he truly goes above and beyond for his customers!

Will definitely return for my next car and refer friends and family. Thanks again!

A friend of mine introduced pant car mart to me. I was quite skeptical about second hand car dealers but Micheal & Mitcher were extremely attentive to me, despite me asking a series of questions. I finally bought my bmw from them. 5/5! I may pay a higher price but I’m happy to do so because I feel the service & most importantly the health of the car that was hand over to me was in extremely good condition!!!!

As a returning customer with Pang’s Motor Trading, the assurance of service and quality units are a constant guarantee. Big thanks to the team at Pang’s, Mitcher, and Mikey for making every drive-away an exciting and hassle-free one.

Worry free and efficient deal with Mitch and Mikey. Very friendly and accomodating to my needs. Genuine and honest about their cars, most importantly is the after-sales service. For Car enthu ppl, pls feel free and worry free to look for them to get your dream car
My go-to car dealer for the past 13 years over a span of 13 cars. Highly recommended for a dedicated and honest car dealer!
